column2: "Transfer to the front will occur momentarily. Your initial goal is to destroy the Falz Arms, to deplete the main body."

"/face6 This looks to be the
most dangerous battle yet.
Please... return safely."

"A fragment of Dark Falz Elder is
approaching at astounding speeds.

It's showing signs of an attack power
we've never seen before. All Arks are to
fight Dark Falz's arms in order to lower
it's fighting capability. This is a direct order!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires,
be defeated in the final area"
